aboutSectionSubtitle: Hello, my name is Arnaud Ouvrier. I come from the French Alps and leave near Versailles, France. I am curently web developer at Nutrimetics France.
whoAmITileSubText: I am Arnaud Ouvrier and 23 years old. I am from France. I am a web developer but also a network administrator
whereAmITileText: Here and there accordingly to my travels. I am actually near Versailles, France. I love discovering new places.
whatDoIDoTileText: I am web developing, hacking, traveling... I like to do a lot of things from web developement to car mechanic.
resumeSectionSubtitle: Hello, my name is Arnaud Ouvrier. I come from the French Alps and leave near Versailles, France. I am curently web developer at Nutrimetics France.
resumeEducation201617Text: Master student in Telecom and IT Networks at the UFR Sciences et Montagne of the University Savoie Mont Blanc (Le Bourget, France)
resumeEducation201516Text: Bachelor's degree in Telecom and IT Networks during an ERSAMUS exchange between the University Savoie Mont Blanc (France) and Centria University of Applied Science (Kokkola, Finland)
resumeEducation201315Text: DUT IT Networks and Telecom (Universitary Diploma of Technology) at the IUT of Annecy of the University Savoie Mont Blanc (Annecy, France)
resumeEducation2013Text: Baccalaureate Industrial Sciences and Technics at the highschool Louis Lachenal (Argonay, France)
resumeExperiencesNutriText: Web developer at Nutrimetics France. I am working on the new digital face of the company by developing a new website including an eshop and a platform where customers can get in touch with beauty professionals.
resumeExperiencesILookText: Android developer of the ILookAndGo app. ILookAndGo is an app made to help people find the best touristic places (hotels, restaurants...) matching their personal criterias.
resumeExperiencesProjTelText: Scholar project for Voxity. Automating the installation of a cloud based telephony system. Usage of Asterisk IPBX, Wazo, OpenStack and OpenVPN.
resumeExperiencesProjHomeText: Creation of a REST API, a web based user interface, a communication protocol between an Arduino, a Raspberry Pi and a pre-existing home automation controller.
resumeSkillsDevText: have started developing in 2006. Since then I have learned how to develop for the web with PHP, JavaScript, HTML5/CSS3 and how to use the main frameworks (WordPress...). I can also program in C++, C#, Java (J2E, Android) and Python.
resumeSkillsRTText: Android developer of the ILookAndGo app. ILookAndGo is an app made to help people find the best touristic places (hotels, restaurants...) matching their personal criterias.
resumeSkillsElecText: Scholar project for Voxity. Automating the installation of a cloud based telephony system. Usage of Asterisk IPBX, Wazo, OpenStack and OpenVPN.
resumeSkillsLangText: I am a French native speaker with a C2 European English level. I have also some basics in German.
